title: WTB: Scrapps Die Cuts Rowe and Thompson

posts.post_title: WTB: Scrapps Die Cuts Rowe and Thompson
posts.post_content: Looking to complete my Scrapps Die Cut set and need a Jack Rowe and Sam Thompson graded SGC 30 or above. Please PM me if you have one to sell or email me at [url]bigpecan@cox.net[/url].
